name: TAPER JEANS
description: Natural Selection jeans are made from high quality 12oz selvedge narrow-width denim, these jeans have a slim fitting leg with a slim fit through thigh and very tapered tight fit from knee to hem, hidden button fly with single button fastening at waist, buttons with emobossed detailing, belt loops, classic 5 pocket styling with embossed leather patch on back waistband and leather tag on back pocket, hand finished, washed whiskering around thighs for a worn look                                               Colour: C-Raw
